meanings.definition: The combination of sounds that forms an environment or a specific auditory experience.
meanings.sent1: The soundscapes of the forest were filled with chirping birds and rustling leaves.
meanings.sent2: I love listening to the calming soundscapes of ocean waves crashing on the shore.
meanings.sent3: The soundscapes of the city at night made it hard for me to fall asleep.
meanings.sent4: Her voice painted a beautiful soundscapes in my mind as she sang.
meanings.sent5: The soundscapes of the thunderstorm were both frightening and mesmerizing.

meanings.definition: Aural landscapes created by the arrangement of various sounds.
meanings.sent1: The soundscapes of the concert hall were carefully crafted to enhance the music.
meanings.sent2: The soundscapes of the movie were so realistic, it felt like I was in the scene.
meanings.sent3: The soundscapes of the party echoed through the neighborhood, drawing attention.
meanings.sent4: His words created a soundscapes of emotions that resonated with everyone in the room.
meanings.sent5: The soundscapes of the jungle at night were both mysterious and captivating.
